data.text: @CamdenMarket @CamdenTownUnltd @MayorofLondon @RefillLondon It would be interesting to find out of the approx 250,000 weekly visitors, how many have downloaded the app and requested a refill?  On my visit, my bottle was filled from a tap in a sink with a "For Handwash Only" sign....
@CamdenBloggers @CamdenTownUnltd @MayorofLondon However, we do have lots of sites in the Market on that offer @RefillLondon free tap water! Good excuse to download the app...
@CamdenTownUnltd @MayorofLondon But sadly not @Camdenmarket, one of London's most popular destinations with a reported 250,000 visitors each week.
